title: grids
extract: Gay-related immune deficiency (GRID) was the original name for a disease currently known as AIDS. GRID was first mentioned in a May 11, 1982 article in The New York Times. In this article, the term "A.I.D." (Acquired Immunodeficiency Disease) is also mentioned.
extract_html: Gay-related immune deficiency (GRID) was the original name for a disease currently known as AIDS. GRID was first mentioned in a May 11, 1982 article in The New York Times. In this article, the term "A.I.D." (Acquired Immunodeficiency Disease) is also mentioned.
